sentences.literal: Therefore called sound begins at palace, exhausts at horn;

sentences.chinese: 數始於一，終於十，成於三；
sentences.literal: Numbers begin at one, end at ten, complete at three;
Qi begins at winter solstice, cycles and again lives.

sentences.chinese: 神生於無，形成於有，形然後數，形而成聲，故曰神使氣，氣就形。
sentences.literal: Spirit lives from nothing, forms from having, form then numbers, form then becomes sound, therefore called spirit makes qi, qi approaches form.
Form principle like categories have what can categorize.

sentences.chinese: 或未形而未類，或同形而同類，類而可班，類而可識。
sentences.literal: Either not yet formed and not yet categorized, or same form and same category, categorize and can arrange, categorize and can recognize.

sentences.chinese: 聖人知天地識之別，故從有以至未有，以得細若氣，微若聲。
sentences.literal: Sages know heaven earth recognize their distinction, therefore from having reach not having, to obtain fine like qi, subtle like sound.

sentences.chinese: 然聖人因神而存之，雖妙必效情，核其華道者明矣。
sentences.literal: Yet sages follow spirit and preserve it, though marvelous must imitate emotions, examine their flowery way ones clear already.

sentences.chinese: 非有聖心以乘聰明，孰能存天地之神而成形之情哉？
sentences.literal: Not having sage heart to ride intelligence wisdom, who can preserve heaven earth spirit and complete form emotions?

sentences.chinese: 神者，物受之而不能知（及）其去來，故聖人畏而欲存之。
sentences.literal: Spirit ones, things receive it but cannot know their coming going, therefore sages fear and desire preserve it.
Only desire preserve it, spirit it also preserves.
Their desire preserve it ones, therefore nothing precious there.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：（故）［在］旋璣玉衡以齊七政，即天地二十八宿。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian says: In whirling jade balance to align seven governments, namely heaven earth twenty eight lodgings.

sentences.chinese: 十母，十二子，鐘律調自上古。
sentences.literal: Ten mothers, twelve children, bell pitchpipes harmonize from high antiquity.

sentences.chinese: 建律運歷造日度，可據而度也。
sentences.literal: Establish pitchpipes move calendar make sun degrees, can rely and measure also.
